name: 流體力學
goals: Prepare to engage in lifelong learning actively
syllabus:
Week 1：Syllabus

Week 2：Introduction

Week 3：Fluid Statics I

Week 4：Fluid Statics II

Week 5：Elementary Fluid Dynamics—TheBernoulli Equation I

Week 6：Elementary Fluid Dynamics—TheBernoulli Equation II

Week 7：Fluid Kinematics I

Week 8：Fluid Kinematics II

Week 9：Midterm Exam

Week 10：Finite Control Volume AnalysisI

Week 11：Finite Control Volume AnalysisII

Week 12：Dimensional Analysis,Similitude, and Modeling I

Week 13：Dimensional Analysis,Similitude, and Modeling II

Week 14：Viscous Flow in Pipes I

Week 15：Viscous Flow in Pipes II

Week 16：FinalExam

Week 17:  Alternative curriculum

Week 18:  Alternative curriculum

methodologies.note: A comprehensive description, as well as relevant outline and summary, will be provided in each chapter
Creative thinking is encouraged in class
A real-world engineering challenge will be provided for students to practice the skills/knowledge learned in class
Students will be assigned in groups to develop the cooperative ability
PPT slides are utilized as media of instruction

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
